com.esri.mo2.ui.lyt
Interface LayoutActionListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseMenu, BasePopupMenu, BaseToolBar
public interface LayoutActionListener
extends EventListener

This class defines an event listener that alons with LayoutActionEvent will provide a communication channel among LayoutActions in different user interface components such as JMenuItem(s) and JButton(s).

Method Summary
 void layoutActionPerformed(LayoutActionEvent event)
          Consumes a LayoutActionEvent
